ygData.subject: Re: quests on Veeshan
ygData.msgSnippet: Been taking the boat to BB a lot lately, and I *always* see the Guardian of Ak Anon over on his little island, but never the Oracle. I guess someone kited the
ygData.messageBody:
Been taking the boat to BB a lot lately, and I *always* see the Guardian of Ak'Anon over on his little island, but never the Oracle. I guess someone kited the Guardian out of the way then killed the Oracle?

Shannyn, lvl 17, not even thinking about baby blues yet


>>> "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Houdeshel" <ldyiggie@...> 11/05/99 06:19AM >>>
From: "Iggie/Alyssandra/Jane Houdeshel" <ldyiggie@...>

Lim Dul asked:

> Hey, any of you other Veeshan wizzies up for maybe finishing some quests
> together sometime? maybe this weekend?
>
> As nice as friends and guilds are...I often find everybody is out for their
> own class-specific stuff. Would be fun to get a bunch of spell-casters
> going around town to get some stuff for ourselves. Nuke-fest! I'm out to
> try to for anything from the jboots, oracle robes, acumen mask, etc.

Is there a quest for the Oracle Robe? I've been searching and searching for info
on one as I really don't want to have to kill the Oracle to get one and buying
one is out of the question for me given the status of my bank account.

Wishing y'all were on Cazic and I'd be up for questing with you.

Thanks in advance!

Iggie
Gnome Wizard
Cazic Thule
